conbody.p: The top-left area of the screen is used for the cellular signal strength indicator, and the corresponding top-right area for the battery level indicator.

fig.title: Signal and battery indicators on the sides of the status pane. Other status indicators are visible below the Navi pane.

conbody.p: The signal indicator is a part of the Status pane, and it is displayed in all states where the Status pane exists. Indicators consist of a bar graph that indicates the current battery or signal level and an icon that describes battery or in signal indicator connected cellular network and its connection state.

section.title: Using signal and battery indicators in C++ applications
section.p: The signal and battery indicators are not accessible to applications.
